summary: Goldie returns from five years at the state pen and winds up King of the pimping game. Trouble comes in the form of two corrupt white cops and a crime lord who wants him to return to the small time.
cast: Max Julien|Don Gordon|Richard Pryor|Carol Speed|Roger E. Mosley|Dick Anthony Williams|William Watson|George Murdock|Juanita Moore|Paul Harris|Kai Hernandez|Annazette Chase|Junero Jennings|Lee Duncan|Stu Gilliam|Sandra Brown|Christopher Brooks|Fritz Ford|John Vick|Norma McClure|David Mauro|Allen Van|Willie Redman|Frank Ward|Ted Ward|Willie Ward|Andrew Ward|Roosevelt Taylor|Jay Payton|Terrible Tom|Bill Barnes|John Foster|Russ Kratzer|June Wilkinson
title: Goldy el chulo
